subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In an autobiography to be published this spring, Gary Sheffield describes his relationship with Barry Bonds, his link to the Bay Area Laboratory Co-Operative steroid distribution case and his three turbulent seasons with the Yankees.
snippet: In an autobiography to be published this spring, Gary Sheffield describes his relationship with Barry Bonds, his link to the Bay Area Laboratory Co-Operative steroid distribution case and his three turbulent seasons with the Yankees.
